categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Kaylon" was the nickname assumed by a clone trooper. He served in the Grand Army of the Republic, with the military rank of Corporal, during the Clone Wars under the leadership of Clone Captain "Styles" and Clone Commander "Grey."

Kaylon made his first appearance in Kanan 2, in which he was killed by Jedi Master Depa Billaba on the planet Kaller during Order 66. When "Aftermath" adapted Order 66 on Kaller, Kaylon was not mentioned.
